about-subtitle1: Sun Lab emerged on the basis of Sun Kids. Sun Kids has been around for 5 years, many children have spent happy days in our walls, which is why our team decided to give this chance to adults as well. This is how SUN LAB was born.
about-subtitle2: Located in the middle of Tbilisi, the school started as a small school for little children with fewer teachers, but now it has grown into a school for all ages.
